I would guess PPP's model is to license their technology to publishing houses or authors directly

likely they're contracting out their first few as proofs of concept
I'm curious what they ingest . . . right now they're building a best of breed book app for iPad, which is the smart play given the market right now
but if what they receive from publishers is reasonably destination independent, they could eventually do the same for other tablet devices when they suck less
